execute_python_code.name: execute_python_code
execute_python_code.description: Executes a given string of Python code in a temporary file and returns the output.

code.description: The string containing the Python code to be executed.

internet_search.name: internet_search
internet_search.description: Conducts an internet search based on a query and a specified search type.

varQuery.description: The query string for the internet search.

varType.description: The type of the search. Can be either 'basic' or 'advanced'. Defaults to 'basic'.
